item.title: How C Program Stored in Ram Memory!
item.description: When you run any C-program, its executable image loaded into RAM of computer in an organized manner which called process address space or memory layout of C program. Here I have tried to show you the same thing in two parts . In the 1st part i.e. “Overview”, we will see segment-wise overview & in 2nd part i.e. “Example”, we’ll see How C program stored in RAM memory? with example.
